Let's go fishing by the lake together.

Pinyin1: jīntiān de tiānqì hěn shìhé chūqù sànbù 。
Chinese1: 今天的天气很适合出去散步。
Translate1: Today's weather is very suitable for going out for a walk.

Pinyin1: wǒmen yīqǐ cháng le xiǎoshíhou xǐhuan de shíwù 。
Chinese1: 我们一起尝了小时候喜欢的食物。
Translate1: Together we tasted foods we loved as kids.

Pinyin1: zài zhèlǐ kěyǐ kàndào xǔduō qíguài de shēngwù 。
Chinese1: 在这里可以看到许多奇怪的生物。
Translate1: Many strange creatures can be seen here.
I like the scenery of nature.
I like reading books.

Pinyin1: tā xiàgèyuè yào bàn hūnlǐ le 。
Translate1: She is going to have a wedding next month.
He is a volunteer.
This year we are going on a trip.

Pinyin1: nǐ shì wǒ zuì zàiyì de rén 。
Translate1: You are the person I care about most.

Pinyin1: wǒ xǐhuan zuòzài zhèlǐ kàn xīngxing 。
Chinese1: 我喜欢坐在这里看星星。
Translate1: I like to sit here and look at the stars.

Pinyin1: tā shì yīgè hěn yǒu yīnyuè tiānfù de háizi 。
Chinese1: 她是一个很有音乐天赋的孩子。
Translate1: She is a very musical child.

Pinyin1: wǒ xǐhuan hé péngyou fēnxiǎng wǒ de gùshi 。
Chinese1: 我喜欢和朋友分享我的故事。
Translate1: I like to share my stories with my friends.

Pinyin1: jīnwǎn wǒmen yīqǐ qù lùyíng bā 。
Chinese1: 今晚我们一起去露营吧。
Translate1: Let's go camping together tonight.

Pinyin1: zhège mìmì wǒ bùhuì shuō chūqù de 。
Chinese1: 这个秘密我不会说出去的。
Translate1: I will not reveal this secret.

Pinyin1: jīntiān wǒ xuédào le hěnduō dōngxi 。
Chinese1: 今天我学到了很多东西。
Translate1: I learned a lot today.
Today's news is shocking.

Pinyin1: wèntí jiějué le ， dàjiā dōu hěn gāoxìng 。
Chinese1: 问题解决了，大家都很高兴。
Translate1: Problem solved, everyone is happy.
The baby is asleep.

Pinyin1: zhètiáo lù tài piānpì le ， wǒmen bùnéng zǒu 。
Chinese1: 这条路太偏僻了，我们不能走。
Translate1: The road is too remote for us to walk.

Pinyin1: nǐ yào bǎ shàngcì de qián huángěi wǒmen 。
Chinese1: 你要把上次的钱还给我们。
Translate1: You have to return the money from last time to us.

Pinyin1: bàngōngshì de rén dōu zài máng 。
Translate1: Everyone in the office is busy.

Chinese1: 书架上放满了各种书籍。
Translate1: The bookshelves are full of various books.
The sun shines on the earth.

Pinyin1: qǐng bǎ yǐzi fàng huí yuánchù 。
Translate1: Please put the chair back where it was.

Pinyin1: zuówǎn tā mèngjiàn zìjǐ zài dùjià 。
Chinese1: 昨晚他梦见自己在度假。
Translate1: Last night he dreamed that he was on vacation.

Pinyin1: tā tóufa diào dé lìhai ， xūyào chīdiǎn yào 。
Chinese1: 他头发掉得厉害，需要吃点药。
Translate1: His hair fell out badly and he needed some medicine.
Mom is cooking!
Let's go to the park today.
The cat sleeps in the corner.

Chinese1: 让我们共同努力，实现梦想。
Translate1: Let us work together to realize our dreams.

Pinyin1: kāihuì qián bǎ huìyìshì zhěnglǐ yīxià 。
Chinese1: 开会前把会议室整理一下。
Translate1: Tidy up the conference room before the meeting.
